item.title: [CTF] PatriotCTF 2023
item.description: PatriotCTF - 2023 URL: CTFtime.org Crypto 1. Multi-numeral You are given a text file containing binary strings. You can use CyberChef to decode the strings: flag: PCTF{w0w_s0_m4ny_number5} 2. My phone! We were provided with an image file that appeared to contain an unusual cipher. To decrypt the message within the image, I utilized the Gravity Falls Bill Cipher tool. By decoding the message from the image, I obtained a result like this:
